Reviews.Content: Stayed during the Olympics; Overall good experience I stayed at the XiaoXiTian branch during the Olympics. Room rates were around $100US a night during that period. Pro: Free Internet In Room; working A/C; relatively clean premise; quiet; English speaking manager; safe area; supermarket, breadshop, and 24hr restaurant with english picture menu right next door; ATM machines close by; daily room cleaning service; working TV; Con: Sewage odor creeps up from the toilet, sink, and shower drain - Pick 4th floor or higher if you can. Had to wire transfer the entire payment in order to secure the rooms (had to put a lot of trust that this is a legit operation). Not near subway. Taxis cost around 30RMB to get to Chaoyang district. Make sure you get the manager to write the Address and the cross-street/directions to the place on a paper for you to hand to the taxi driver. Taxi drivers may not know where exactly the address is. Webiste:www.365inn.com.cn
Reviews.Author: Hubbstyle

Reviews.Content: good location the bad:the shower - literally no water came out of it, and the little amount that came out was cold we were there in March so it was a litte too cold for cold showersTV: just chinese no heating - thus very cold in marchthe noise: altough there are very few cars it is still very loud, people waling by, motorcycles ...the god:location: conveniently located - if you know how to find it in the first place. you have to wald 5 min to get a taxi because the hotel is in a small street were there are no taxisthe cafe: is not part of the inn but you have to walk thourgh it to get into the inn, so homey, comfortabel, UNIQUE decoration, good breakfast (not cheap though), excellent fresh mango juiceinternet access: 2 computers access is for freebeds were comfortableroom was cleani would stary there again
Reviews.Author: nellAustria

Reviews.Content: Moderate I decided to stay here after reading the reviews from TripAdvisor. I stayed total 7 nights. 3rd floor rooms are bigger and nicer than the 2nd floor. Rooms are clean except there foul smell in the toilet, guess it's the poor sewage system, however still bearable. Room was not clean daily during my stay. There are 2 computer at the reception, internet access for free. Staff were friendly. Laundry service was cheap. Overall with the price paid, could not ask for moreHotel is a 15 mins walk from Qianmen subway. Once you get out from subway take the exit 'C'. Then you need to use the underground tunnel to cross over to the other road. Most of the road sign on the small roads are only in Chinese..
Reviews.Author: jeremy65

Reviews.Content: Amazing bar in the lobby! We had a great time kickin' it in the lobby and drinking coffees, beers, etc. Rooms were clean, modern, etc. Very satisfied with our stay. Lots of great bars/restaurants, etc. around.
Reviews.Author: hardcorecanada

Reviews.Content: Great place       Room on the second floor
Reviews.Author: Mickr

Reviews.Content: Highly recommended We stayed at 365 Inn (Bejing) in Feb-2007 and are staying there again next year. We had a 2-bed room with ensuite which was very clean and had aircon, TV etc. There was also free internet access in the lobby, and the accom. was very reasonably priced so we had no complaints at all. The hostel has a restaurant/bar out front and there's a really great atmostphere all round. Also, it is very central (just a few minutes walk from the Forbidden City). The hostel is located right in the middle of shoppers heaven and you are surrounded by hundreds of small shops where bargaining is the only way to go. We definitely recommend 365 Inn - clean rooms, very reasonably priced, centrally located and a great atmosphere.
Reviews.Author: cweir
